title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Guided Tours
body: Guided Tours         Park historian conducts tour of Spotsylvania Court House battlefield NPS Photo    Please see our Operating Hours and Seasons page for information on regularly scheduled guided tours. Other guided tour requests can usually be accommodated from special groups. The earlier a group is able to schedule their visit, the more likely the park will be able to accommodate, so call early! See the contact information below:   For a brief orientation talk (25-45 minutes, free) or for a half or full day tour ($200 or $300, respectively), contact Greg Mertz by calling (540) 693-3200 x 4100. Those wanting guides for military staff rides, Civil War Round Tables or other group tours should contact Greg Mertz by calling (540) 693-3200 x 4100. Teachers wanting guides for school field trips should contact education coordinator Peter Maugle by email at peter_maugle@nps.gov      Also see the special events page for additional programs.
